articles.author: Lloyd Lee
articles.title: Meet the wife of Ukraine's Volodymyr Zelenskyy — First Lady Olena Zelenska
articles.description: Olena Kiyashko worked as a scriptwriter for a comedy series that starred Volodymyr Zelenskyy. A few years later, she'd become Ukraine's First Lady.

articles.author: Morgan McFall-Johnsen
articles.title: Aurora borealis may reach New York, Chicago, Portland Wednesday night
articles.description: Eruptions of plasma from the sun are careening toward Earth, so forecasters expect a geomagnetic storm to push the northern lights south on Wednesday.
articles.content:
Eruptions of electrically charged plasma from the sun might push the aurora borealis all the way to New York, Chicago, and Portland, Oregon on Wednesday night.

articles.title: Secret Service knew of threats against Pelosi days before Jan. 6: CREW
articles.description: Capitol Police weren't alerted about the threats until 5:55 p.m. on Jan. 6, 2021, by which time officers were already under siege by a violent mob.

articles.author: Meredith Cash
articles.title: Brittney Griner: Russian penal colony resembles Gulag labor camps
articles.description: Direct descendants of the Soviet Union's Gulag system, Russian penal colonies are prison labor camps notorious for human rights abuses and corruption.

articles.description: Some metro stations received nearly one month's worth of rain within one hour, reported a French weather account run by volunteers.
